reviewText: This is nice series. It would be nice if they include more episodes of the series.

This an excellent documentary series. One of the best, I've seen. (And I've seen many.)
As an American Civil War buff, as well as a Living Historian (Reenactor) I find this series to show more accurately the trials of the CW Soldier, on the battlefield. My only disappointment is the fact that there are more episodes to this series than what has been released, here. This DVD is only Season 1. There were a total of three seasons. Why Seasons 2 & 3 were never transfered to DVD, is a tradgedy.
excellent is all i can say

Grew up watching this show and loved it! helped me get started with my interest in history, especially from 1861-65. Very happy I made this purchase. it came on time! I recommend this DVD if you want Quality Documentaries of the war between the states narrated by Judge Frollo himself; Tony Jay!
